resources:
Welcome in Pydia! A lab for the future of Pydio Cells on Android All your data on your device, everywhere, at any time! First, configure your connection to your remote Pydio server: Configure a connection
Pydia The next generation client for Pydio Cells on your mobile device Troubleshooting Pydio Cells is a trademark of Abstrium SAS. The current application is a client for mobile device, entirely rewritten in Kotlin by B. Sinou based on his and others previous open source work, in or outside Abstrium. Version name: %s Version code: %s Last update on: %s If you cannot get this application to work correctly, please check us on github or on the forum. Contact Support More info
OK Confirm Next Back Upload done. Exit Run in background Cancel Show as grid Show as listHome Sort by… Filter by… Manage connection Clear list Re-sync Skip Launch Sync Empty Cache
%d item selected
%d items selected
Open Close Home Start using the app! Choose an account Browse Workspaces Offline Files Bookmarks Transfers Background Jobs Logs About Search Settings House keeping Re-log to server
Open menu drawer
My Workspaces Quick Access My Account
No workspace to list Either the server is unreachable, or you may have lost your permissions. In the latter case, please contact your site administrator. This folder is empty No content here yet No bookmark has been defined for this account… There is no recent transfer to show No transfer with \"%s\" status No folder has been tagged to be kept offline for this account…
Choose an action to apply to the selected items No action can be performed when the server is un-reachable Un-select all Show more actions for this element Open location Open parent location Synchronise Launch synchronisation with remote server now Open with… Download to device Rename… Copy to… Move to… Public link Create or delete a public link for this element Keep offline Remove from offline Remove bookmark Remove bookmarks Keep this element offline Bookmark Bookmark this element Delete Pause Relaunch Resume Empty recycle Restore Permanently remove Create folder here Import from device Take picture Share Copy to clipboard Display as QR-Code Delete public link Link copied to clipboard Failed to copy link
Sort By
Open with… Delete account\n%s ? It will forget the connection information for your remote server and also delete all cached data and files. Logout account\n%s ? It will forget your credentials for this server: you must then log again to connect. This action will free space but will force re-downloading of image preview and folder content. Danger: you are about to empty the cache for all accounts.\n\nAre you sure you want to proceed? Danger: you are about to erase all local data, including the configured accounts.\n\nAre you sure you want to proceed? Clear cache Create an account Register a new server Preview of the content Create folder Create Please enter a name for the new folder Confirm deletion %s will be moved to the recycle bin
The selected item will be moved to the recycle bin
The %d selected items will be moved to the recycle bin
Confirm permanent deletion %s will be definitively deleted This empties the recycle bin for %s: all trashed content will be definitively deleted. Rename Please enter a new name for %s Rename Downloading, please wait… Confirm download %1$s size is %2$s and you are on a metered network.\n\nAre you sure you want to download it? Direct link Scan the code to directly access %s at:\n%s
Downloading… Confirm download This file is large (%s) and you are on a metered network. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Name
Unexpected error… Server is un-reachable Cannot list folder content Cannot download file Downloads on metered networks are restricted,\nyou can change this in the application settings
No internet connection Captive portal: sign in required On a metered connection Using a roaming connection
No account defined Register a new account Please, enter your server address e.g: https://files.example.com Authentication process has been launched Cancel Invalid certificate Invalid certificate Someone could be trying to impersonate the site and you should not continue.\n\n Websites prove their identity via certificates. Your device does not trust %1$s because its certificate issuer is unknown, the certificate is self-signed, or the server is not sending the correct intermediate certificates.\n\n Accept the risk and continue Go back (recommended) OK, I understand the risks Processing Please be patient.
Connection Down Cannot connect to %1$s as %2$s: %3$s Re-authenticate Account is connected Credentials are expired No or invalid credentials
My Accounts Manage already registered remote servers No account has been configured yet… Account detail title Account details description Are you sure you want to forget this account %s? No account, please configure at least a connection
Please wait while loading content… Choose a workspace to browse Browse your remote servers Empty Recycle Bin Server: %s Logged in as %s Cells Workspaces Last check never Inside %s Cannot preview %s Unavailable preview
Search… Enter a term to search your files! No result found for \"%s\" Cannot perform search You can only search among already cached nodes
Synchronising… Downloading files… Walking the tree to look for changes A synchronisation process is already running, please wait before launching a new one Confirm your choice Removing the offline status of this node can lead to losing the downloaded data. Are you sure you want to proceed
Re-launch transfer Uploading… Upload terminated Current transfers Share to… Copy to… Move to…
Select a location Choose an account Choose a target workspace Choose a target folder
Updating… Deleting… Renaming… Moving… Restoring…
Background jobs There is no job to show Filter by status Sort by Creation (newest first) Creation (oldest first) Clear terminated Delete record
Clear application logs Application logs The journal is empty
Migrating legacy data, please wait… Successfully Upgraded to New Version! You have one or more items marked as offline, this migration requires a full re-download now. Do you want to proceed? You can skip it and synchronize later.
Customise lists (when applicable) Type of layout Use larger grid Limitations on metered network
Apply limitations Warning: turning this off will skip all limitations when on a metered network. This might lead to raising costs Custom colors Adapt color themes to network status, like mobile data or roaming. Download thumbs Also retrieve thumbnails when on metered network Ask before download When file is greater than (in MB) Ask before download when target file is greater than (in MB)
Offline synchronisation Sync frequency Choose a frequency for background synchronisation Run sync when network is Choose a type of network that constrains when we can launch the synchronisation When charging Only launch sync when the device is charging When Idle When the device is idle When battery not low When the battery is not low
Troubleshooting Show advanced tools Gives access to more insider info to help troubleshooting unexpected behaviours Disable poll Turns off the automatic poll of the server while browsing. This should be used carefully: typically, you then have to explicitly refresh a page to see a new folder after creation
Feedback and help Send feedback Report technical issues or suggest new features
Cleaning parameters Fine tune how what you will erase from your local device: Include Offline Also delete files that are in parts of the tree that have been marked as offline Forget credentials Also forget stored credentials: you will have to log in again Extend to all accounts Apply the above cleaning strategy to *all* accounts Erase All DANGER: you will remove everything from the local device
Create or import Exit the application Choose another remote server Application logo
Current item is being refreshed Small content preview Folder icon Empty list icon
Choose an account Switch account Switch workspace Parent folder Sort order
